concept.title: 52.226-4 Notice of Disaster or Emergency Area Set-Aside.

conbody.p: As prescribed in 26.206(b), insert the following clause:
Notice of Disaster or Emergency Area set-Aside (NovÂ 2007)

li.p: (a) Set-aside area. Offers are solicited only from businesses residing or primarily doing business in ________________________________________________ [Contracting Officer to fill in with definite geographic boundaries.] Offers received from other businesses shall not be considered.
(b) This set-aside is in addition to any small business set-aside contained in this contract.
